name: Plaque in the Box
description:
Moe the Molar is trapped in a box and has only 3 minutes until he succumbs to the plaque attack!

Find the 4 keys scattered about the level to unlock the box and prevent a complete dental breakdown!



Move with the arrow keys.

Jump with up or space.

Press R to restart the level.

Plaque in the Box was made in 2:56:56 for TriJam #170. I finally managed to make a game in less than 3 hours, although it has no music, which is a little sad. Thanks for checking out the page!
